part-1.-novid_des: Skip the startup movie when launching {g} and go directly to the main interface.
part-1.-perfectworld_des: Launch {g} in Perfect World mode, suitable for players in China.
part-1.-console_des: Enable the developer console within {g}, allowing input of debugging commands.
part-1.-language schinese_des: Set the {g} interface language to Simplified Chinese, but keep English voiceovers.
part-1.-high_des: Set the CPU priority of the {g} process to high, which may improve {g} performance.
part-1.+fps_max {fps}_des: Set the {g} frame rate, up to a maximum of 1000 FPS.
part-1.-tcp_des: Force {g} to use the TCP protocol for network connections, suitable for solving UDP connection issues.
part-1.-udp_des: Force {g} to use the UDP protocol for network connections. This is the default setting.
part-1.-dev_des: Enable developer mode, unlocking additional debugging features.
part-1.-enable_addons_des: Allow the engine to load custom content within the {g} folder and replace VPK files.
part-1.-override_vpk_des: Allow the engine to search for custom content within the {g} folder and replace VPK files. Using this may affect matchmaking functionality.
part-1.-nomicsettings_des: Prevent {g} from modifying microphone output values, suitable for players using other voice software.
part-1.-map dota_des: Preload the map at startup, reducing loading time when entering {g}.
part-1.-32bit_des: Run {g} in 32-bit mode, suitable for older systems or hardware.

part-2.cn-harmony_des: After enabling, black blood becomes red blood, and some skill/item icons are consistent with the international version.

part-3.title: DevTools
part-3.description: After enabling, use F12 to open developer tools to view program running status and debug information.

part-3.title: Background Material
part-3.description: System background material is a Windows 11 feature. When enabled, some page backgrounds will use background material.

/about.title: About
/about.description: {D} is a smart launcher designed for 《Dota2》 players. It allows you to quickly manage {g}'s launch options, provides customized functional modules, and helps players quickly enter the battlefield and unleash their competitive potential.
/about.author: Developers
/about.blurb: {D} is a professional {} launcher, providing convenient {g} management and optimization features.

/hud.Table_tooltip: Provide reminder notifications based on game time
